text: The 2015 FIFA Puskás Award was the seventh FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on January 6, 2016, during the 2015 FIFA Ballon d'Or Gala in Zurich, Switzerland. Vila Nova player Wendell Lira was the winner of the award, for his goal against Atlético Goianiense in the 2015 Campeonato Goiano.
